entities.name: wilkie twycross
entities.description: Wilkie Twycross is mentioned as the one who inspired a number of nicknames for him, including 'Dog-breath' and 'Dung-head'. He is also referred to as having three Ds.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and the birthday boy. He receives a present from Harry on his birthday.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Ron's friend who gives him a present on his birthday. He also hides the Marauder's Map after every use.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus wakes up Harry and Dean to go for breakfast.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean wakes up with Seamus to go for breakfast.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is a magical object that Harry hides after every use. It can be found in his trunk beneath the rolled-up socks.

entities.name: felix felicis
entities.description: Felix Felicis is a lucky potion that Ron keeps in his bottle. It is hidden beneath the rolled-up socks in Harry's trunk.

relationships.description: Harry gives a present to Ron on his birthday.
Seamus wakes up with Dean to go for breakfast.
